mapper.sql: t1.id as "id" ,t1.account_id as "accountId" ,t1.serial_number as "serialNumber" ,t1.amount as "amount" ,t1.currency as "currency" ,t1.op_app_user_id as "opAppUserId" ,t1.op_account_type as "opAccountType" ,t1.op_account_id as "opAccountId" ,t1.op_account_sub_type as "opAccountSubType" ,t1.op_account_sub_id as "opAccountSubId" ,t1.other_app_user_id as "otherAppUserId" ,t1.other_account_type as "otherAccountType" ,t1.other_account_id as "otherAccountId" ,t1.other_account_sub_type as "otherAccountSubType" ,t1.other_account_sub_id as "otherAccountSubId" ,t1.out_trade_date as "outTradeDate" ,t1.out_order_no as "outOrderNo" ,t1.out_order_name as "outOrderName" ,t1.state as "state" ,t1.trade_type as "tradeType" ,t1.trade_type_name as "tradeTypeName" ,t1.trade_channel as "tradeChannel" ,t1.trade_agency as "tradeAgency" ,t1.trade_desc as "tradeDesc" ,t1.pay_type as "payType" ,t1.pay_trade_no as "payTradeNo" ,t1.pay_result as "payResult" ,t1.is_direction as "isDirection" ,t1.is_correct as "isCorrect" ,t1.is_red as "isRed" ,t1.fin_subject_code as "finSubjectCode" ,t1.fin_voucher_id as "finVoucherId" ,t1.data as "data" ,t1.create_id as "createId" ,t1.create_ip as "createIp" ,t1.date_created as "dateCreated" ,t1.date_updated as "dateUpdated" ,t1.memo as "memo" ,t1.bi_update_ts as "biUpdateTs"
mapper.select:
select
from account_log t1 where t1.id = #{id}

select
from account_log t1 where 1=1
order by t1.date_created desc

select
from account_log t1 where 1=1
order by t1.date_created desc
